5.text: Advance to Trafalgar Square. If you pass Go, collect $200

10.text: You are assessed for street repairs. $40 per house, $115 per hotel

11.text: Make general repairs on all of your buildings. For each house pay $25. For each hotel pay $100

12.text: Advance to Pall Mall. If you pass Go, collect $200

13.text: Take a trip to Marylebone Station. If you pass Go, collect $200

18.text: You have a crossword competition. Collect $100
